source: Research Writer — rationalized data from all research tokens

bioengineering.USAG-1: Uterine sensitization-associated gene-1. Protein that inhibits tooth growth by blocking BMP and Wnt signaling. Target of Japanese tooth regeneration drug.
bioengineering.BMP: Bone Morphogenetic Protein. Family of growth factors (BMP-2, BMP-4, BMP-7) that induce bone and dental hard tissue formation.
bioengineering.Wnt Signaling: Cell signaling pathway crucial for development of supernumerary teeth and cell fate decisions. Works with BMP.
bioengineering.LRP5: Low-density lipoprotein receptor-related protein 5. Wnt pathway coreceptor essential for osteoblast specialization.
bioengineering.Hydroxyapatite: Calcium phosphate mineral forming the crystalline structure of teeth and bones. Formula: Ca10(PO4)6(OH)2.
bioengineering.Ameloblast: Enamel-forming cell. Uses calcium channels (TRPM7, SOCE) to build tooth enamel.
bioengineering.Osteoblast: Bone-forming cell. Differentiates from stem cells via BMP-2 and Runx2 signaling.
bioengineering.Osteoclast: Bone-resorbing cell. Gallium inhibits its acid secretion to prevent bone loss.
bioengineering.Periodontal Ligament: Connective tissue suspending teeth in sockets. Contains mechanoreceptors for proprioception.
bioengineering.Trigeminal Nerve: Largest sensory nerve in head. Carries tooth proprioception data to brain.
bioengineering.Proprioception: Body's sense of position and movement. Teeth use this via periodontal mechanoreceptors.
bioengineering.Toregem Biopharma: Japanese startup developing USAG-1 antibody for tooth regeneration. Clinical trials 2024-2026.

nanomedicine.Gold Nanoparticle (AuNP): Nanoscale gold particles used to promote osteoblast differentiation and deliver biomolecules.
nanomedicine.MAPK Pathway: Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase cascade. Signal amplification pathway triggered by mechanical stress on cell membranes.
nanomedicine.Runx2: Master transcription factor for osteoblast differentiation. Upregulated by gold nanoparticle mechanical stress.
nanomedicine.Gallium (Ga): Semi-metal used in bone-loss treatment. High affinity for active bone formation. Phase-changes near room temperature.
nanomedicine.Gallium Maltolate: Gallium compound shown to disrupt SARS-CoV-2 replication.
nanomedicine.Liquid Metal (GLM): Gallium-based liquid metals used in bioelectrodes, electronic blood vessels, and cryopreservation.
nanomedicine.TRPM7: Transient receptor potential melastatin 7. Calcium channel regulating ameloblast calcium absorption.
nanomedicine.SOCE: Store-Operated Calcium Entry. Pathway regulating intracellular calcium for enamel formation.
nanomedicine.Aplastic Anemia: Condition where bone marrow stops producing blood cells. Risk from excessive gold salt therapy.
nanomedicine.Metallic Glass: Platinum-based amorphous metal structure tested for biocompatible orthopedic implants.
nanomedicine.Bioelectrode: Gallium-based electrode integrated with vascular stents for real-time blood pressure monitoring.

sovereign-tech.Quantum Intent Collapser: System that transforms passive interactions (likes/clicks) into active asset generation commands.
sovereign-tech.Vector Trigger: Click that maps multidimensional coordinates of user interest rather than binary like/dislike.
sovereign-tech.Sovereign Builder: User who creates infrastructure from interactions rather than donating data to platforms.
sovereign-tech.Alchemist's Chain: Value multiplication pipeline: Token → Research → Tool → Asset.
sovereign-tech.Time-to-Value: Metric measuring speed from idea to published asset. Infinity system reduces this to minutes.
sovereign-tech.Digital Property: Published website/repo that holds compounding value as an asset.
sovereign-tech.Distributed Intelligence: Network of repo-machines that grows with every user interaction.

c13b0-architecture.Sequinoid Packet: Dissipative Soliton — self-sustaining wave pattern maintaining structure while exchanging energy.
c13b0-architecture.The Cure: Bio-Energy Signal Output protocol. Research tokens = captured signals, published repos = rectified output.
c13b0-architecture.Dissipative Soliton: Localized structure in a dissipative system maintained by continuous energy flow.
c13b0-architecture.Signal Winding: Transformation phase in C13B0 pattern: Input → Signal Winding → Output.
c13b0-architecture.Rectification: Output phase. Converting processed signals into published, structured assets.
c13b0-architecture.Forge Toolbar: Shared UI component deployed across all repos for ecosystem navigation.
c13b0-architecture.Crown Index: Central dashboard aggregating all repos, categories, and status.
c13b0-architecture.Machine Routing: Prev/next navigation system connecting 80+ machine repos in sequence.
c13b0-architecture.Research Token: Structured research document with YAML metadata, stored in mongoose.os vault.

forge-system.REPO_FORGE: Script that creates machine repos with full HTML, chat widgets, and navigation.
forge-system.FORGE_DEPLOY: Script that deploys emoji-logic toolbar and 4-Hash token structure.
forge-system.FORGE_AUTOLINK: Script that mass-links all repos with forge toolbar. Handles 409 SHA conflicts.
forge-system.FORGE_DJVERTIGO: Script that built DJVertigo-token repo and linked 30 additional repos.
forge-system.DEPLOY_ROUTER: Script that created infinity-router.js for unified navigation across hubs.
forge-system.ECOSYSTEM_LINKER: Script that links category repos, spark repos, and fixes blank pages.
forge-system.BUILD_MACHINES: Script that creates machine pages, tools repo, and 510-term dictionary.
forge-system.RESEARCH_WRITER: Script that mass-produces research tokens, dictionary entries, and chapter pages.
